# PicoBase

> The open source backend for vibe coders. A managed Backend-as-a-Service (BaaS) platform — the Supabase/Firebase alternative built on PocketBase.

PicoBase gives developers zero-config database, auth, realtime, and file storage without managing infrastructure. From `npm install` to production data in 3 minutes.

## Key Features

- Zero-config setup — reads PICOBASE_URL and PICOBASE_API_KEY from environment
- Auto-creating collections — write to any collection name and it exists
- Real-time database with WebSocket subscriptions
- Built-in authentication (email/password + OAuth)
- File storage
- TypeScript-first SDK
- React hooks and components
- REST API for every collection
- Open source and self-hostable
- Per-tenant isolation

## Quick Start

```
npm install @picobase_app/client
```

```ts
import { createClient } from '@picobase_app/client'
const pb = createClient()

// CRUD — collections auto-create on first write
const post = await pb.collection('posts').create({ title: 'Hello' })
const posts = await pb.collection('posts').getList(1, 20, {
  filter: 'published = true',
  sort: '-created',
})

// Auth
await pb.auth.signUp({ email: '...', password: '...' })
await pb.auth.signIn({ email: '...', password: '...' })

// Realtime
const unsub = await pb.collection('posts').subscribe((e) => {
  console.log(e.action, e.record)
})
```
